Question: The girl in the left image is blonde.

Reference Answer: True

Left image URL: https://i.pinimg.com/736x/be/19/ba/be19ba612f01ea7e74da83e3df0f5adc--comfy-pajamas-pjs.jpg

Right image URL: https://i.pinimg.com/736x/f4/07/cd/f407cdae56232ba6104da7c4552a74b9--womens-pajamas-pjs.jpg

Original program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=LEFT,question='Is the girl in the image blonde?')
FINAL_ANSWER=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=LEFT,question='Is the girl in the image blonde?')
FINAL_ANSWER=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Is the girl in the image blonde?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>yes</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>yes</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: True
